name: isla granny square sweater
notes:
please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www.lakesideloops.com.

modern twist on a crochet classic! this beautiful granny square sweater is classy, boho chic, and (most excitingly) perfect for all 4 seasons! crochet yours with cotton yarn and take advantage of the naturally spaced stitches for a lightweight spring layer or breathable summer cover up . . . or use acrylic or wool for a heavier more cozy fall & winter feel. either way this pullover is sure to be your next favourite make!

in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible, the pattern includes:

**written pattern 
pictures 
chart 
video tutorial** 
(*left hand pattern available upon request*)
